page.title: 19HOUSING (cont)
page.content: { HOUSES cont.} The room height has to be at least seven foot six inches.The stairs must not be steep,the rising is seven and a half inches and for the going nine and a half inches.One has thermal blocks and is painted and the house with bricks is not painted.The house has four bedrooms made by the workmen.The floor is made of chipboard specially designed for houses,the rooms are large and have cupboards built in.The houses have two bathroom suites aswell,one you can only get to from the bedroom.It takes 20 men to do all the jobs like installing the drains or putting the electricity in.They need all the wires and the gas boiler for the heating.These two new houses were recently sold for Â£118,000 & Â£120,000 each.
